str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Persecution, affliction, distress, tribulation. From thlibo; pressure.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The sun, sunlight. From hele; the sun; by implication, light.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To darken. From skotos; to obscure.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The moon. From selas; the moon.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Brightness, light, splendor, radiance. Probably akin to the base of phos; brilliancy.
